episodes.title: Cults and Coercive Control with Dr Alexandra Stein - a talk with the Yoga Teachers Union, UK
episodes.description:
In this talk Dr Alexandra Stein explores coercive and cult-like dynamics and techniques.  Her deep understanding and clearly articulated analysis of disorganised attachment in her book: "Terror, Love and Brainwashing" has helped many to identify and navigate away from highly problematic student/teacher dynamics that often play out in the Yoga Industry. 

http://www.alexandrastein.com/
https://www.yogateachersunion.co.uk/
